A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I agree with most people that the social justice aspect of this movie was fairly sickening.  I also am not a huge fan of the direction that Disney is taking Star Wars but that's the least of my concerns.  My real issue is the fact that the writing was poor\, the acting atrocious\, and the film downright boring.  I am blown away by the critics reviews on this film.  They must have been paid off
